data.message: Hello facebook team i want to get a blue badge i am from Iraq, please reply and thank you

replies.message: Hey Alem. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2xuwVVL. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. Information for this badge can be found in the Help Center here: http://bit.ly/2xb384I. -Tenaya
When I enter on the gray page link the quote is not available in some people
